text: viśvāsavantayini! ṣeyitāngē pā saṭahan anugamanaya nokaranu. (mandayat) kavurun ṣeyitāngē pā saṭahan anugamanaya kara yannēda ohuva, ohu avaman gena dena kāraṇāvanda, pāpatara kriyāvanda karana men niyata vaśayenma poḷam̆bavaminma siṭinu æta. allāhgē dayāvada karuṇāvada oba kerehi notibuṇē nam, obagen kisivekut kisi kaleka pariśuddhavantayeku vaśayen siṭiya nohæka. ehet allāh taman adahas karana ayava pariśuddhavantayin bavaṭa pat karannēya. allāh savan denneku hā (siyalla) hon̆din danneku vaśayen siṭinnēya
